recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve some pasta water.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together. Set aside.
Sauté pancetta in olive oil, add garlic.
Toss drained pasta with pancetta, remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water if needed.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Season and cook chicken, slice and set aside.
Cook fettuccine pasta until al dente.
Melt butter, sauté garlic, add heavy cream.
Stir in Parmesan, mix until smooth.
Combine pasta with sauce, top with chicken.
